Text:
Sorry people. For now I can only upload @ 33Kb/s, but it seems as though it has pushed through, so the speeds should be up. I will seed forever, and soon have a better high speed internet.

Maxim3434

I recommend you avoid compressing mp3 files, they are already compressed so you don't save any space (actually it often slightly increases the file sizes).

It also means that people can't select individual files to download and can make it a pain to extract partially corrupted downloads.
